content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

We’ve seen images from Transformers 4 before, but this is our first “official” look at the upcoming film.

This first look at Transformers 4 comes to the internet courtesy of director Michael Bay himself.

Bay uploaded the picture to his site, MichaelBay.com with the caption “Just another day on the set of Transformers 4. Pictured left to right: Jack Reynor; Mark Wahlberg; 2nd Assistant B-Camer Casey “Walrus” Howard; 1st Assistant B-Camera John Kairis with back to camera; B-Camera Operator Lukasz Bielan; Director Michael Bay; and Director of Photography Amir Mokri.”

Nice to see the crew of the film getting a shout out along with the film’s stars Wahlberg and Reynor.

Transformers 4 hits theaters on June 27th of next year.
